trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> that supports <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl"></xref>, such as <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Represents a <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> that supports <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl"></xref>, such as <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate"></xref> class with the specified type for which the template is intended.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate"> </xref> klassen med den angitte typen malen er ment.

trans-unit.source: The `dataType` parameter is either a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] object or a string representing an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: Den `dataType` parameteren er enten en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] objekt eller en streng som representerer en [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] elementet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Binding Sources Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [Binding kilder oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The type for which this template is intended.
trans-unit.target: Typen som denne malen er beregnet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of alternating item containers for the child items.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hvor loddrette beholdere for underordnede elementer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties enable you to specify the appearance for two or more alternating item containers.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Egenskaper kan du angi utseendet for to eller flere vekslende elementet beholdere.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify alternating background colors for every third item in an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel angi vekslende bakgrunnsfarge for alle tredje elementer i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is assigned to each item container in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Er tilordnet til hver elementbeholderen i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> begins at 0, increments until it is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A> minus 1, and then restarts at 0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>starter på 0, øker før den er <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A>minus 1 og deretter starter på 0.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A> is 3 and there are seven items in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, the following table lists the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> for each item.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A>3 og sju elementer i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, følgende tabell lister av <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>for hvert element.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: |Position of Item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |1|0| |2|1| |3|2| |4|0| |5|1| |6|2| |7|0| When you set the AlternationCount property, you are indicating that the child items should get an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> in that range, not the item that has this <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate> applied to it.
trans-unit.target: | Posisjonen til elementet i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |&1; |&0; | |&2; |&1; | |&3; |&2; | |&4; |&0; | |&5; |&1; | |&6; |&2; | |&7; |&0; | Når du har angitt egenskapen AlternationCount, angir du at de underordnede elementene må få en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>i dette området, ikke elementet som har denne <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate>brukt den.</xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl> called `aHeaderedItemsControl` uses a <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate> with the AlternationCount set, the item containers of the child items of `aHeaderedItemsControl` will have an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, not the item container for `aHeaderedItemsControl`.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>kalt `aHeaderedItemsControl` bruker en <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate>med settet AlternationCount elementet beholderne for de underordnede elementene for `aHeaderedItemsControl` får en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, ikke elementbeholderen for `aHeaderedItemsControl`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: There are several methods you can use to specify different appearances for the alternating item containers.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes flere metoder du kan bruke til å angi forskjellige utseende vekslende beholderne som elementet.

trans-unit.source: One method is to bind properties of the items container to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Én måte er å binde egenskaper for beholderen elementer til <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can then use an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter> to specify which value should be applied to the item container that has a certain <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value.
trans-unit.target: Deretter kan du bruke en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter>til å angi hvilken verdi som skal brukes for elementbeholderen som har en bestemt <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>verdi.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter>

trans-unit.source: You can also use triggers to change the value of an item container's property depending on the value of its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke utløsere til å endre verdien for en elementbeholderen egenskapen avhengig av verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The number of alternating item containers for the next level of items.
trans-unit.target: Hvor loddrette beholdere for neste nivå av elementer.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref> that is copied to each child item.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref> som er kopiert til hvert underordnet element.

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemBindingGroup%2A> property, each item container gets a <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> that has the same <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> objects as the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemBindingGroup%2A>, but the properties that describe the data in the bindings, such as <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.BindingExpressions%2A>, are specific to the data for each item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemBindingGroup%2A>egenskapen hver elementbeholderen henter en <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>som har samme <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>objekter som den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemBindingGroup%2A>, men egenskapene som beskriver dataene i bindingene, for eksempel <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.BindingExpressions%2A>gjelder bare for dataene for hvert element i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.BindingExpressions%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemBindingGroup%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemBindingGroup%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must access the item container's <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.BindingGroup%2A> to perform operations such as validate the data and check for errors on an item.
trans-unit.target: Du må bruke elementbeholderen <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.BindingGroup%2A>til å utføre operasjoner som Valider data og se etter feil i et element.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.BindingGroup%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref> that is copied to each child item.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref> som er kopiert til hvert underordnet element.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Style"></xref> that is applied to the item container for each child item.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Windows.Style"> </xref> som skal brukes på elementbeholderen for hvert underordnet element.

trans-unit.source: You use this property or the <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate.ItemContainerStyleSelector%2A> property to set a style to affect the appearance of the elements that contain the data items.
trans-unit.target: Du bruker denne egenskapen eller <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate.ItemContainerStyleSelector%2A>til å angi en stil for påvirker utseendet til elementer som inneholder dataelementer.</xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate.ItemContainerStyleSelector%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>, the generated containers are <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> controls; for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, they are <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> controls.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>, genererte beholderne er <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>kontrollerer; for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>Kontroller.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Style"></xref> that is applied to the item container for each child item.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Style"> </xref> som skal brukes på elementbeholderen for hvert underordnet element.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets custom style-selection logic for a style that can be applied to each item container.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir egendefinert stil-utvalg logikken for en stil som kan brukes på hver elementbeholderen.

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate.ItemContainerStyle%2A> property to set a style to affect the appearance of the elements that contain the data items.
trans-unit.target: Du bruker den <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate.ItemContainerStyle%2A>til å angi en stil for påvirker utseendet til elementer som inneholder dataelementer.</xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate.ItemContainerStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>, the generated containers are <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> controls; for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, they are <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> controls.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>, genererte beholderne er <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>kontrollerer; for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>Kontroller.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: If you have more than one style defined and need to supply logic to choose which one to apply, then you use the ItemContainerStyleSelector property instead of the <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate.ItemContainerStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du har angitt mer enn én stil og må ha logikken for å velge som skal brukes, vil du bruke egenskapen ItemContainerStyleSelector i stedet for den <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate.ItemContainerStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate.ItemContainerStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that this property is ignored if the <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate.ItemContainerStyle%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: Merk at denne egenskapen ignoreres hvis den <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate.ItemContainerStyle%2A>-egenskap er satt.</xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate.ItemContainerStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.StyleSelector"></xref> that chooses which style to use as the <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate.ItemContainerStyle*>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.StyleSelector"> </xref> som velger som style skal brukes som <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate.ItemContainerStyle*>.</xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate.ItemContainerStyle*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the binding for this data template, which indicates where to find the collection that represents the next level in the data hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bindingen for denne datamalen for, som angir hvor man finner samlingen som representerer neste nivå i hierarkiet data.

trans-unit.source: This is applied to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> property on a generated <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl> (such as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> or a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>) to indicate where to find the collection that represents the next level in the data hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjelder den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>egenskap i en generert <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>(som en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>eller <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>) til å angi hvor man finner samlingen som representerer neste nivå i hierarkiet data.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see the type.
trans-unit.target: ## XAML tekst-Bruk For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] informasjon, kan du se den type.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a composite string that specifies how to format the items in the next level in the data hierarchy if they are displayed as strings.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en sammensatt streng som angir hvordan du formaterer elementene i neste nivå i hierarkiet data hvis de vises som strenger.

trans-unit.source: A composite string that specifies how to format the items in the next level of the data hierarchy if they are displayed as strings.
trans-unit.target: En sammensatt tekststreng som angir hvordan du formaterer elementene i neste nivå i hierarkiet data hvis de vises som strenger.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> to apply to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate*> property on a generated <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl"></xref> (such as a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref>), to indicate how to display items from the next level in the data hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref> skal brukes i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate*>egenskap i en generert <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl"> </xref> (som en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"> </xref>), som viser hvordan du viser elementer i neste nivå i hierarkiet data.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> to apply to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate*> property on a generated <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl"></xref> (such as a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref>), to indicate how to display items from the next level in the data hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref> skal brukes i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate*>egenskap i en generert <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl"> </xref> (som en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"> </xref>), som viser hvordan du viser elementer i neste nivå i hierarkiet data.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"></xref> to apply to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplateSelector*> property on a generated <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl"></xref> (such as a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref>), to indicate how to select a template to display items from the next level in the data hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"> </xref> skal brukes i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplateSelector*>egenskap i en generert <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl"> </xref> (som en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"> </xref>), som viser hvordan du velge en mal til å vise elementer fra neste nivå i hierarkiet data.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplateSelector*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"></xref> object to apply to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplateSelector*> property on a generated <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl"></xref> (such as a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref>), to indicate how to select a template to display items from the next level in the data hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"> </xref> objekt for å bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplateSelector*>egenskap i en generated <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl"> </xref> (som en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"> </xref>), som viser hvordan du velge en mal til å vise elementer fra neste nivå i hierarkiet data.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplateSelector*>
